(An official document marked 'top secret' listed killings that the JVP carried out during this time.)   Just 15 year ago JVP attacked the holiest of Buddhist shrines, the sacred Sri Dalada Maligawa in Kandy and also the Katunayake International airport.   During the period 1987-1992 the JVP murdered hundreds of members of the working class in the South of the island in order to force people to join anti-government strikes.   text-align:center">Peoples' Liberation Front
